sources.title: Mad Youth
sources.description: A rich society mother (Betty Compson) and her beautiful daughter (Mary Ainslee) both fall for the same man (Willy Castello). Unfortunately, he's a gigolo who only wants their money.

sources.title: Mad Youth (1939) EXPLOITATION
sources.description:
Stars: Mary Ainslee, Betty Compson, Willy Castello
Director: Melville Shyer

When a rich society mom hires a male escort, he falls for her daughter instead. The conflict forces the daughter to run off to stay with a friend who is enslaved by a prostitution ring.

sources.title: Mad Youth (1939) Propaganda Drama | Full Length Movie
sources.description:
FREE-LIVING MOTHERS! - NEGLECTED DAUGHTERS! - PAID ESCORTS!  
A rich society mother hires a male escort, but he falls for her daughter instead. The mother-daughter conflict forces the daughter to run off to stay with a friend who is enslaved by a prostitution ring.

Director: Melville Shyer
Writer: Willis Kent
Stars: Mary Ainslee, Betty Compson, Willy Castello
Aka Modern Mothers
